EmailTemplate.name: 201804_Global_Email_EGPWS_KGP560_mih.201804_Global_Email_EGPWS_KGP560_mih
EmailTemplate.subject: KGP560 EGPWS Terrain Database Release Notification - Version 602
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> DearÂ {{lead.First Name:default=Customer}}, Honeywell has released a new KGP560 EGPWS Terrain Database - version 602. This latest terrain database version is an update to the previous version 601 and it adds several new airports, runways and obstacles while improving terrain mapping and resolution.
The database can be purchased by visiting Wingman Services <[[https://wingmanservices.bendixking.com/wingman/Home.do]]> (login required). EGPWS change info is located there (no login required), look under news and updates.
If you have any questions, please let us know.
Best regards,
The Honeywell EGPWS Team DSA@Honeywell.com <[[mailto:DSA@Honeywell.com]]>
If you no longer wish to receive these emails, click on the following link: Unsubscribe <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/2017_Email_Confirmation_OptOut.html]]>
